segment.source: Use the Target OS page to specify which operating systems in your environment can run this virtual application package.
segment.target: Use the Target OS page to specify which operating systems in your environment can run this virtual application package.

segment.source: The operating systems specified on this page can only run this virtual application package if the application you are sequencing supports the operating systems specified.
segment.target: The operating systems specified on this page can only run this virtual application package if the application you are sequencing supports the operating systems specified.

segment.source: Review the supported operating systems for the application you are sequencing to ensure compatibility.
segment.target: Review the supported operating systems for the application you are sequencing to ensure compatibility.

segment.source: This page contains the following elements:
segment.target: This page contains the following elements:

segment.source: Allow this package to run on any operating system
segment.target: Allow this package to run on any operating system

segment.source: Enables the virtual application package to be installed and run on all supported operating systems.
segment.target: Enables the virtual application package to be installed and run on all supported operating systems.

segment.source: Allow this package to only run on the following operating systems
segment.target: Allow this package to only run on the following operating systems

segment.source: Enables the virtual application package to be installed and run only on the selected supported operating systems.
segment.target: Enables the virtual application package to be installed and run only on the selected supported operating systems.
